original_title: UFC Fight Night 62: Maia vs. LaFlare
overview: UFC Fight Night 62: Maia vs. LaFlare was a mixed martial arts event held on March 21, 2015 at the Ginásio do Maracanãzinho in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. This event was headlined by a welterweight bout between Demian Maia and Ryan LaFlare.
title: UFC Fight Night 62: Maia vs. LaFlare
